name: Personality Changer
description:
IMPORTANT: This app was made for control FuЯby Boom. Without FuЯby Boom this app does nothing and you cannot use it. You can use it only to control this toy.

Toy's owners know that this toy have different characters depending on how they play with it. It could be hard to change Toy's character and it often takes a lot of time and effort. You can change its character really fast using this app. Just point your phone at your toy and select the character that you want. Your phone will send commands that you won't hear and the toy will recognized it and its character will change. You can see how it works from this video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=N6I7ohJgmgA
Required condition: The sound on your phone has to be turned on.
